title: In Rathmines, plans progress for primary-care centre and housing
content: The HSE has filed a planning application for a new health-care centre at the Gullistan bring centre site.

title: Look at converting some social homes in city-centre flats into cost-rentals, says Taoiseach’s group
content: No decision has been made on whether that will happen, a Dublin City Council spokesperson has said. But it hasn’t been ruled out.

title: RTB tribunal finds Tramco renters are licencees not tenants, overturning a previous decision
content: The landlord argued that the renters in the Rathmines building were hotel guests and that they didn’t have exclusive occupation.

title: How a log chalet home led to a 10-year planning row between three siblings
content: A 73-year-old woman who was granted retention for her log chalet home is locked in a planning dispute after her two brothers objected to the decision.

title: Is overpaying your mortgage and reducing the term a good idea?
content: First-time buyers can focus on reducing the mortgage burden but there should be other priorities for any spare cash

title: Harris agrees to meet parents of child who died after waiting years for scoliosis surgery
content: The Tánaiste has sought a full multidisciplinary report on the timeline of care provided to Harvey Sherratt, who died last month.

title: Ireland is seventh most expensive country for mortgages in the eurozone
content: Mortgage advisors have warned borrowers not to take make large financial decisions in the current economic climate.
